itineraries.title: Ireland's Food & Drink Trail: Farmers Markets, Whiskey Tours & Coastal Pubs

seo.h1_title: Ireland's Food & Drink Trail: Farmers Markets, Whiskey Tours & Coastal Pubs
seo.intro_paragraph: Savor Dublin's craft markets and bars, step into Kilkenny's workshops, explore Cork's farm scene and taste Kenmare's maritime traditions. Listen to music in Dingle and Doolin, wander through Galway, then meet producers and artisans in Clifden and Westport.
seo.seo_hook: Farmers' markets overflowing with local produce, peat-tinged whiskey, seafood impossibly fresh. Irish cuisine, generous and authentic.

itineraries.title: Ireland's Complete Circuit: Wild Atlantic Way, Ancient East & Northern Coast

activities.text: Bird watching Irish National Heritage Park.

seo.h1_title: Ireland's Complete Circuit: Wild Atlantic Way, Ancient East & Northern Coast
seo.intro_paragraph: Explore literary Dublin, cross Wicklow's green landscapes, follow the Wild Atlantic Way and walk the windswept heights of Connemara. Admire Donegal's cliffs before approaching the Giant's Causeway, where Ireland shifts from mineral silence to the crash of waves and legends.
seo.seo_hook: Mountain silence answering ocean thunder, emerald valleys sheltering ancient stones, coastal roads hugging cliffs. Ireland calls.
featured_list: Cliffs of Donegal: dramatic coastal majesty

itineraries.title: Ireland's Iconic Coast: Ring of Kerry, Cliffs of Moher & Connemara

visits.text: Trinity College and Book of Kells.

activities.text: Tasting at Crawford Art Gallery Café.

seo.h1_title: Ireland's Iconic Coast: Ring of Kerry, Cliffs of Moher & Connemara
seo.intro_paragraph: Wander through Dublin between Georgian facades and literary heritage, then reach the misty valleys of Glendalough around its monastic ruins. Lose yourself in Kilkenny's medieval lanes, breathe Cork's creative energy and let the Dingle Peninsula blend rugged mountains with untamed ocean.
seo.seo_hook: Georgian mansions evoking the past, monastic ruins piercing the mist, medieval lanes winding with charm. Essential Ireland.

itineraries.title: Secret Places of Ireland: Hidden Villages and Coastal Treasures

seo.h1_title: Secret Places of Ireland: Hidden Villages and Coastal Treasures
seo.intro_paragraph: Explore Dalkey and its coastal charm, walk Enniskerry's terrain, contemplate the sacred Rock of Cashel and reach lively Kinvara harbor. Cross Ballyvaughan and Cong, tour Achill Island, follow Mullaghmore, sail at Carrick-on-Shannon before returning to Dublin and its literary secrets.
seo.seo_hook: Whitewashed cottages nestled in valleys, stone churches crowning hills, rivers winding between forgotten villages. Secret Ireland.
